category: National Pension Review Committee Operation Regulations/Article 3 (Representative Claims, etc.)
contents: Article 3 (Representative Claim, etc.) ① If the claimant's representative files a request for review, he/she must attach relevant documents such as a power of attorney in Form No. 2, a copy of the identity card of the proxy and agent, and a certificate from the family relationship register. Revised December 21, 2020, September 16, 2022. ② In the case where multiple claimants select a representative and file a request for examination, prove their qualifications, such as a representative selection form in Form No. 3 and a copy of the ID card of the delegate and representative. Applicable documents must be attached. Revised September 16, 2022. ③ If the applicant sends a request for examination by mail, he or she must attach documents that can prove his/her identity, such as a copy of his or her ID card. ④ If the documents stipulated in paragraphs 1 through 3 are not attached, the Corporation shall guide the applicant to submit them. Revised 2022. 9. 16.
